entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023
